name: Matrix Binary Heart Wars
description:
A role playing game set 26 years in the future after Dark Saturn was released from prison and became Light Beacon and a new organisation Matrix 12 emerges...

If you like the game consider getting your friends to give it a try and asking if they will give a donation of $4

arrow keys to move and x to interact with door and npc and z and x to attack in battle

You sent note if a unit is not on your side of the field and the z or x key is not working it is because the unit that does that attack is not on the field so press the other key
